title: My phone in reboot loop.called Google help (Ref> # 4=0317000026263) . No alternatives What next?
content:
Can not try anything because of loop. Out of warranty since January. Just made final payment. Called Google help and they suggested  traveling to nearest"partner" , 100 miles away. No cost or time estimate.
How do I get info off of phone before I send it to the dumpster and get another brand ?
